TopicTitle: [0.21] Kerbal LiveFeed: Passive Multiplayer Plugin/Client/Server v0.7.1

Articles.Content:
Here is a updated client and plugin for KSP version 25. Server is running at gaterunner.com (just enter gaterunner.com as the ip address and it will connect) seems stable so far after configuring the ports on the blade.

http://www.gaterunner.com/ksp/KerbalLiveFeedforKSP25.zip sourcecode in zip file. Just place KLFclient.exe in your KSP directory and the KLF folder into your gamedata folder.
Great job getting it working again Stavell. I assume you're also trying to contact the original author?

Great job getting it working again Stavell. I assume you're also trying to contact the original author?

Yes I have sent message to Author for permission to update.

Also you can see all Screenshots shared via Kerbal Live Feed Gaterunner Server here http://ksp.gaterunner.com I set up a Live Gallery it is updated in real-time from the server.

Just finished configuring a Monitor Service for the KLFServer application on the blade server - (Should auto restart the KLF Server if it crashes) and ( will make sure KLFServer is active if the Blade Server reboots)

New forum Post for KLF V7.5+ support http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100793-25-v7-6-0-0-Kerbal-Live-Feed-Interstelar-Flight-Inc-%28FORK%29

Edited November 27, 2014 by Stavell

Yes I have sent message to Author for permission to update.

This is my number one favorite mod for kerbal, and the only mod I ever used actually. Will it ever be ported to latest beta version? Thumbs up for all time high mod!

... Will it ever be ported to latest beta version? ...

See thread http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100793
